technology.short_description: Though the Askar have a strong sense of camaraderie with their leader, having a ceremony for those worthy can make them utterly devoted.

effects.description: Hero action success chance: +5% for Emirs

technology.short_description: We can learn much from the study of our forefathers and the Priest Kings.

effects.description: Leadership: +10 when fighting against Tomb Kings

technology.short_description: Learn from your past to better your future.
Overseen by the Dervishers the prays and rites are performed before the body is washed and to taken to the Tower of Silence where the carrion birds feast.

effects.description: Upkeep: -15% for Feral Giant Vulture units and Dervishers units
Leadership: +10 for Feral Giant Vulture units

technology.short_description: What secrets lie in the blood scrawl, just try to not let them consume you or maybe do...

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +3 per turn
	(all armies)
Attrition: -33% casualties suffered from all attrition

technology.short_description: Some say these relics should be cherished and held in some great palace. I say we use them to make our own history.
Cover yourself with the glory of the sultan and you may earn your freedom.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Sharkas Slave and Pit-Fighter units
Weapon strength: +15% for Slave Rabble and Pit-Fighters units

technology.short_description: Together we stand and fight, as equals, as brothers.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -20% for Nomad Trackers, Jezzails, Southlands Warriors, Camel Lancers, Desert Riders, Camel Archers and Camel Jezzails units

technology.short_description: They are not monsters, they're simply misunderstood.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Enchanted Ropes, Genie, Desert Spirit, Fire Efreet, Sea Nymph, Tempest Djinn, Waghzen and Flying Carpets units
Ward Save: +5% for Enchanted Ropes, Genie, Desert Spirit, Fire Efreet, Sea Nymph, Tempest Djinn, Waghzen and Flying Carpets units

technology.short_description: How to strike man and beast from the shadows, it may not be honourable but it is often fatal.

effects.description: Hero action success chance: +8% for Hashishins

technology.short_description: Legendary order of assassins, renowned and feared across Araby. Your thoat will be slit long before you ever catch wind of them.

effects.description:
Assassinate action: Additional 5% success chance
	(all Heroes)

technology.short_description: A collection of Arabyan myths and legends, it's readers inspired to join its pages.
Any problem can be solved through the application of algorithms.
Our future lies in the mind, protected by the sword.
Victory can be gained not only on the battlefield. We shall see our enemies hunger, thirst before they ever raise a blade to us.
An ingenious timepiece that proved to be vital for the Arabyan shipping lanes. It involves bonding a genie to the device, trapped forever to count the seconds of its imprisonment.
No other can rival the majesty of our buidlings, and through our writings we can create bigger, more elaborate structures faster than ever.

effects.description: Construction time: -2 for Province Capital/Settlement buildings

technology.short_description: Subjected to military drills since early manhood, all citizens must train in the disciplines and honor of warfare.

effects.description: [HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide

technology.short_description: We will be the envy of our successors and will go down as the greatest of our people.
True power lies in the ancient runes of Nehekhara.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +15
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: An encyclopedia of medical texts that will serve our peoples for eons and ensure our finest veterans can keep fighting.

The leader of the most influential chaos cult in all of Araby, made infamous for the portal to the Chaos realms they constructed. They managed to scrawl their knowledge in blood before being possessed by an agent of Tzeentch.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

technology.short_description: Suliman became renowned as a deadly, exotic warrior across not only his native Araby but the Old World too. Though he is seen as traitor to some for his Bretonnian ties.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Palace Guards and Arabyan Knights units
Missile resistance: +10% for Palace Guards and Arabyan Knights units

technology.short_description: The chosen one, not an Arabyan but a foreigner, a man of the Empire but this does not stop him from being widely revered across Araby and the Old World. Now many study his countless battles and heroism.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for Arabyan Knights and Camel Cathaphracts units
Speed: +10% for Arabyan Knights and Camel Cathaphracts units

technology.short_description: Through selective breeding, we can rear Elephants that rival even Norscan Mammoths.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Elephants and War Elephant units
Melee defence: +5 for Elephants and War Elephant units

Recruit rank: +3 for Elephants and War Elephant units
	(all provinces)

technology.short_description: The camel is a mighty creature that can bear the weight of more than just cargo. Those that wimper under the burden of armour are slain on sight.
It is most honorable to die defending your homeland and the Sultans honour.
PLACEHOLDER

effects.description: Melee defence: +6 for all Tomb King units

technology.short_description: PLACEHOLDER

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +20 with the Scythan god Tutankhanut and the faction of Numas.

technology.short_description: It is said that there is no man more disturbed, evil and vile than the Arabyan necromancer known as Har-Ak-Iman who penned this cursed book.

The author, in the service of the Sultan of Copher, was not only a powerful Arabyan sorcerer but a cruel and feared spymaster. His writing included how to torture those with the use of magic to great effect.

effects.description:
Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +10%
	(factionwide)

Miscast base chance: -10% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(all characters)

Spell resistance: 10% when fighting against Tzeentchian factions
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: Many stories of bloody war that even the wisest of despots can learn from.
There is much honour and tradition in the Arabyan bow.

effects.description: Missile strength: +10% for Arabyan Archer, Camel Archer and Al-Raheem Nomad units

technology.short_description: Nepotism is a sickness that can bring down even the mightiest of Empires. Let the greatest serve you rather than us serve the weak.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Lords and embedded Heroes

technology.short_description: Considered one of the best sorcerers, the Mullah was a famous and revered Arabyan warrior. His many teachings are used to this day even in ways he might not condone.

effects.description: Missile strength: +10% for Grand Bombards, Jezzails, Camel Jezzails, and Gajnal Juggernaut units

technology.short_description: We are the line between those that seek to destroy us and our families. If we are to turn and flee we will be lucky to escape with just lashes.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Arabyan Warriors, Arabyan Spearmen, and Arabyan Archer units
Melee defence: +5 for Arabyan Warriors, Arabyan Spearmen, and Arabyan Archer units

technology.short_description: Hit them and hit them again and keep doing so until they are either dead or run.

effects.description: Reload time reduction: +15% for Grand Bombards, Jezzails, Camel Jezzails, and Gajnal Juggernaut units

technology.short_description: We will decorate our camp with their entrails.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for all Arabyan Nomad units
Speed: +10% for all Arabyan Nomad units

technology.short_description: Steam-powered automated drills are a recent, if noisy, invention by the Engineers' Guild.

effects.description: Income from Iron Mines, Gold Mines and Stone Quarries: +15%
